alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 5:55PM MST until March 06 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. New snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches across the Ogden and Morgan Valleys, and 2 to 5 inches further south around Park City and the Heber Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Sunday. The heaviest period of snow is expected from this evening through the overnight hours. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected tonight through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.
